divs: Sighting DetailsI observed a bright pale orange object fly silently through the night sky,first seen coming from the west then gradually turning slowly,to my left placing it in a north west direction,there was no sound at all,and being a very quite night,you would here if it was any type of plane,plus I live in a small town that is very quiet at night,this object flew very slowly and peacefully through the sky,it was visible for at least 4 minutes,until it flew out of sight out over the ocean,witnessed by myself and my daughter and here friend from across the street,this is the second object in the past week that we have seen,very similar,other than the fact that the first object was a bright white light,I search the sky every chance i get,because a few years ago there was a fair amount of activity in this area,but then it seemed to slow right down,but now this gives me new hope that activity is on the rise again in this area,there are a lot of people that see things around this area but they never report them .
Summary: very bright orange light flying slowly through the sky no sound flying west to north west lasted about 4 minutes
